translation.errorRetrievingForm: An error seems to have occurred while retrieving the form from our server. Contact the administrator of this website. Error:

translation.clickForm: Click on the form name to display additional details.
translation.listForm: This page lists all the forms that have ever been created.
translation.title: Title
translation.confirmCloseForm: Are you sure you want to close this form?
translation.confirmCancelForm: Are you sure you want to cancel this form?
translation.confirmDeleteForm: Are you sure you want to delete this form? This action cannot be reversed.
translation.errorAction: An error occurred while trying to perform this action. Please contact the administrator of this website. Error: {{error}}
translation.changeVote: You can change your vote by simply casting a new vote.
translation.errorIncorrectConfSchema: Incorrect form configuration, please fill it completely:
translation.voteFailure: Your ballot hasn't been taken into account. It might be that the form has been closed or cancelled. Try refreshing the page.
translation.ballotFailure: An error occurred while sending your ballot. Please contact the administrator of this website.
translation.minSelectError: You need to select at least {{min}} {{singularPlural}}.
translation.maxSelectError: You cannot select more than {{max}} answers.
translation.minTextError: You need to fill at least {{minText}} {{singularPlural}}.
translation.maxTextChars: Answer must be less than {{maxLength}} characters long.
translation.regexpCheck: Answer must be of the form: {{regexp}}.
translation.voteExplanation: You may cast a ballot as many time as you want while the form is open. Only your last vote will be taken into account.
translation.noVote: There is currently nothing to vote on.
translation.voteAllowed: You are allowed to vote on the form(s) below. Click on a form title to display its ballot and vote.
translation.displayResults: The results of the form(s) listed below are available. Click on a form title to access them.
translation.noResultsAvailable: There is currently no available results.
translation.resultExplanation1: Results for select and text question are given in percentage of the number of votes for a candidate divided by the number of ballots cast.
translation.resultExplanation2: Results of rank question corresponds to the percentage of the score a candidate has. Each voter gives candidates points by ranking them from 1 (0 points) to N (N-1 points) (lower is better).
translation.resultExplanation3: The score corresponds to the sum of the points a candidate got and is divided by the total number of points attributed across all ballots, and subtracted to one.
translation.notEnoughBallot: The operation failed because less than two ballots have been casted.
translation.operationFailure: The operation failed. Try refreshing the page.
translation.voteImpossibleDescription: The form is not open for voting anymore.
translation.about0: The following diagram pictures the d-voting system from a deployment point of view. It describes the components and their interactions.
translation.about1: This website hosts the interface of an evoting system. This system runs smart contracts, handled by a set of Byzantine fault-tolerant nodes.
translation.about2: When an administrator creates a form, the form parameters are saved on a blockchain and so are every following transaction (closing/cancelling form, casting a vote etc...).
translation.about3: A distributed key is generated at form creation time so that when a user votes, his/her vote is encrypted with the key guarantying the anonymity of the vote. However the system doesn't enforce the anonymity of the voter.
translation.about4: When a form is closed, the nodes shuffle the ballots and check its correctness before decrypting the shuffle and publish the result of the form on a smart contract.
translation.votersAdded: The following voters have been added:
translation.inputAddVoters: For every voter, add their SCIPER on a new line
